overview:
Bejoy Jaison is a technology expert with telecommunication giant Nokia Siemens Networks.

He holds the formal role of Global Concept Owner for Java Software Engineering Environments. His career is marked by hands-on involvement in development during the early days, as a telecom domain and integration expert during the middle phase and later in multiple agile development roles. Bejoy has been involved with knowledge management strategy and roll-out for almost five years. His passion for Web technology, which he pursues as a hobby, runs for over 10 years.

He lives in Bangalore, India with his family. Apart from technology, he fiddles with his guitar and loves writing and making music.
